page.title: 20Tillington Estate.
page.content: The general impression of Tillington Estate is very good.It is a popular residential area.The houses were built between 14-20 years ago.The houses are mostly semi-detached with a few bungalows and detached houses.These houses have medium sized gardens attached to them. There is a local pub, called "The Luck Penny",which is a very popular place at weekends.There is also a playing field and a park nearby.There are two main roads,Crab Lane and the Eccleshall Road.The other amenities include a newsagents,two supermarkets (Spar and the Co-op),an off-licence. There is also a three star hotel called "Tillington Hall".Holmcroft Library is another popular place for it's residents and a well-known family church named St.Bertelins in the area.
